description: Arab and Muslim Americans voting for Trump to punish the Democrats for their failures in Gaza should be careful what they wish for, warns Wa'el Alzayat.
title: Dear Arab Americans, voting Trump won't teach Harris 'a lesson'

description: The bill approving to ban the Palestinian refugee agency in Israel is likely to disenfranchise scores of Palestinians of across Palestinian territories.

description: Robinson, one of the UK's most notorious far-right figureheads, has received his latest jail sentence, this time for 18 months over contempt of court.
title: Tommy Robinson jailed for 18 months over contempt of court

description: Officials in Baghdad have blamed Israel for standing in the way of Iraq possessing adequate air defence systems in a volatile region
title: Israeli pressure stopped Iraq acquiring weapons: officials

description: Jamshid Sharmahd, who was kidnapped in Dubai in 2020 by Iranian security forces, has been executed in Iran after being convicted on terror charges.
title: Iran executes Iranian-German national after terrorism conviction

description: South African legal experts have submitted more evidence in their country's genocide case at ICJ against Israel, including statements by extremist settlers
title: South Africa submits more evidence for ICJ Israel genocide case

description: Israeli attacks in Lebanon have devastated historic sites, fueling widespread condemnation and highlighting the urgent threat to the country's cultural heritage
title: Heritage at risk as Israel targets Lebanon’s historic landmarks

description: Year-ago contrast shows white splotches replace neighbourhoods, while unveiling wide destruction in hilltop villages and towns.
title: Israeli campaign devastates Lebanese border towns, images show

description: Analysis: Iraq's Tishreen protests demanded an end to the post-2003 sectarian political system and elite corruption, but their grievances remain unaddressed.
title: Five years on: The legacy of Iraq's Tishreen protest movement

description: Saudi Arabia is seeking to draw major international investment toward its NEOM mega project, amid reports of a slowdown in its ambitious plans.
title: Saudi 'Davos in the Desert' to draw investors for MbS's NEOM

description: Israel has been attacking Lebanese army positions despite US pleas and international calls for the Lebanese armed forces to be strengthened, raising questions
title: Why is Israel targeting the Lebanese Armed Forces?

description: Tunisia's coastguard has recovered the bodies of 16 migrants off the coast of the towns of Maloulech, Salakta and Chebba, the national guard said on Monday.
title: 15 people found dead off Tunisia coast: judiciary

description: Fatah leader Marwan Barghouti, who has been held by Israel since 2002, was reportedly beaten three times in the past year by Israeli guards.
title: Fatah warns Israel after Marwan Barghouti 'beaten in prison'

description: Let the horrific murder of Sha'ban al-Dalou serve as another reminder of the Western media's collective complicity in the Gaza genocide, says Abubaker Abed.

description: Let the horrific burning alive of Sha'ban al-Dalou serve as another reminder of Western media complicity in Israel's genocide in Gaza, says Abubaker Abed.

description: The UK says it may provide data from surveillance flights over Gaza to the ICC as evidence, but denied it was providing Israel with targeting information.
title: UK considering giving Gaza intelligence to war crimes court

description: Iraq has lodged a formal complaint with the United Nations, accusing Israel of violating Iraqi airspace to carry out attacks on Iran.
title: Iraq lodges UN complaint over Israel using its airspace to attack Iran

description: Israeli Defence Minister Yoav Gallant made the comments in a letter sent to the Prime Minister's office shortly before Israel's attacks on Iran on Saturday.
title: Israeli Defence Minister: Israel is fighting 'without a compass'

description: The WFP has urged Sudan's warring parties to allow full access for its aid operations, warning that the country faces an imminent risk of famine.
title: WFP calls for full access to Sudan amid looming famine

description: Iranian authorities have permitted imprisoned Nobel Peace Prize laureate Narges Mohammadi to be hospitalised after she experienced illness for nearly nine weeks
title: Iran Nobel laureate imprisoned, hospitalised with health issues

description: Syrian Air will reinstate flights to Jeddah twice weekly, 18 months after Saudi Arabia and the Assad regime normalised ties
title: Syrian national airline resumes flights to Saudi city of Jeddah

description: Yedioth Ahronoth further claimed that based on the GDC's proposal, the company will bring about 1,000 American fighters to Gaza.
title: Israel mulls pushing Gaza's occupation to private military firms

description: Analysis: Israel's ambitions in Gaza extend beyond Sinwar's death, with Netanyahu viewing military force as the only strategy for achieving his objectives.
title: Why Sinwar's death won't change Israel's war strategy in Gaza

description: Arab and Muslim communities in Virginia are becoming increasingly active ahead of the 2024 elections, focusing on the Gaza war and seeking better representation
title: US elections see rise in Arab-American engagement in Virginia

description: Hundreds are expected to protest outside the French consulate in Tangier this evening, rallying against "Macron's support" of Israel's war on Gaza.
title: Pro-Palestine groups protest Macron's Morocco trip over Gaza war

description: Global stocks diverged and oil prices tumbled on Monday as markets were relieved that Israel's strikes on Iran had avoided the country's energy infrastructure.
title: Stocks rise slightly as MidEast tensions ease; oil prices fall

description: The social platform X has suspended an account associated with Iran’s Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, which had been sharing messages in Hebrew.

description: Danny Kushmaro looked into the camera and said 'don't mess with the Jews' after detonating the building, amid the sound of cheers.
title: Israeli TV journalist slammed for blowing up Lebanon building

description: In-depth: Israel is expected to approve legislation severing its ties with UNRWA, part of long-standing efforts to undermine the Palestinian right of return.
title: What's behind Israel's long-running campaign to dismantle UNRWA?

description: US envoy Amos Hochstein is in Israel to discuss a ceasefire in Lebanon, but Israeli forces continue to strike the south, killing dozens of people at the weekend

description: US envoy Amos Hochstein is in Israel to discuss a ceasefire in Lebanon, but Israeli forces continue to strike the south, killing dozens of people at the weekend
title: Hochstein in Israel to discuss Lebanon ceasefire, Tyre bombarded

description: Early voting has started in Michigan, one of a handful of critical swing states with large communities of Arabs and Muslims.
title: Early voting in Michigan kicks off in tight US presidential race

description: Gaza health authorities have said Israel’s 24-day army operation in north Gaza has killed close to 1,000 people, meanwhile Egypt proposes a two-day truce.

description: Israel's Knesset passes bill to ban the Palestinian refugee agency from operating in the country, while Tel Aviv continues to heavily strike Lebanon and Gaza.

description: According to health officials, Israel’s 24-day military operation in north Gaza has resulted in over 1,000 deaths, the majority of whom are women and children.
title: Israel’s siege of north Gaza enters fourth week; 1,000 killed

description: Lebanon said an Israeli strike on Tyre on Monday killed seven people. The Israeli army later issued an evacuation call for swathes of the southern coastal city.
title: Lebanon's Tyre targeted in new wave of Israeli strikes

description: US news website Axios on Saturday said Israel has "sent message to Iran" ahead of its attack and warned it "against a response".
title: Iran FM says 'received indications' before Israeli attack

description: Iran's Revolutionary Guards backed by intelligence forces and police on Sunday killed at least four "terrorists" suspected of involvement in a drone strike
title: Iran kills four after deadly attack in southeast: report
